buyer_persona.decision_process: 30-60 day sales cycle, requires manager approval

pain_point.description: Manual regulatory document search consuming 15+ hours/week per person
pain_point.intensity: High - direct impact on audit response times and compliance costs
pain_point.current_solution: Manual search through SharePoint, file shares, email attachments

budget.procurement_process: Budget approval required, may need vendor evaluation

do_not_pursue: Company <10 employees (too small for recurring spend)
No budget for software (will churn after trial)
Company in distress or frequent leadership turnover

qualification_questions: How many people are on your compliance team?
How much time per week does your team spend searching for regulatory documents?
What tools are you currently using for compliance document management?
What is your budget for compliance software this year?
When is your next regulatory audit scheduled?
